original: // rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin sgom thabs kyi sgron ma bzhugs so //
analyzed: rnal byor spyod ba lugs nges ba don la ji bzhin sgom thabs kyi sgron ma bzhugs so

original: ji bzhin pa yi chos btsan par //
analyzed: ji bzhin ba yi chos btsan ba

original: chos la chos ni mi 'jug ste //
analyzed: chos la chos ni mi jug ste

original: ji tsam zab pa'i tshig brjod kyang //
analyzed: ji tsam zab ba tshig rjod kyang

original: don dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang mthun ba mi gyur ro

original: sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas dang // ci la'ang mi dmigs zhes bya ba //
analyzed: sems ni ci la mi gnas dang ci la mi dmigs zhes byed ba

original: sems la gnas dmigs skyon sel ba'i //
analyzed: sems la gnas dmigs skyon sel ba

original: sems 'dzin phra mo de la yod //
analyzed: sems dzin phra mo de la yod

original: smig rgyu bzhin du sems med na //
analyzed: smig rgyu bzhin du sems med na

original: mi gnas mi dmigs byed pa gang //
analyzed: mi gnas mi dmigs byed ba gang

original: nam mkha' rang la'ang mi gnas zhes //
analyzed: nam mkha rang la mi gnas zhes

original: bsgom pa don dang ldan ma yin //
analyzed: bsgom ba don dang ldan ma yin

original: de bzhin skyil krung 'dug pa dang // lus kyi bcos pa thams cad kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin skyil krung dug ba dang lus kyi chos ba thams cad kyang

original: lus rtog mngon par zhen las byung //
analyzed: lus rtogs mngon ba zhen las byung

original: lus med mkha' la bcos su med //
analyzed: lus med mkha la chos su med

original: sgyu ma bzhin du lus shes na //
analyzed: sgyu ma bzhin du lus shes na

original: drang 'dug skyil krung 'cha' ba med //
analyzed: dren dug skyil krung cha ba med

original: spyod lam gsum gyi gnas pa gang //
analyzed: spyod lam gsum gyi gnas ba gang

original: ched du bya med byed pa'ang med //
analyzed: ched du byed med byed ba med

original: lus sems ma skyes gzhi med pa //
analyzed: lus sems ma skye gzhi med ba

original: mkha' ltar bcos pa'i kha na med //
analyzed: mkha ltar chos ba kha na med

original: tshad mar lus sems 'chos byed pa //
analyzed: tshad mar lus sems chos byed ba

original: 'dzin pa'i phur pa de la yod //
analyzed: dzin ba phur ba de la yod

original: ji ltar mtshan med nam mkha' ni //
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan med nam mkha ni

original: dmigs dang dmigs med rtsol dang bral //
analyzed: dmigs dang dmigs med rtsol dang bral

original: de bzhin sems nyid nam mkha' yang //
analyzed: de bzhin sems nyid nam mkha yang

original: rang bzhin nyid kyis de lta'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid kyis de lta

original: lus la sogs kyang de bzhin te //
analyzed: lus la sogs kyang de bzhin te

original: rtsol ba med phyir gang ltar yang //
analyzed: rtsol ba med phyir gang ltar yang

original: gnas pa med de mi gnas na //
analyzed: gnas ba med de mi gnas na

original: mi 'gal tsam du gyur pa yin //
analyzed: mi gal tsam du gyur ba yin

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin sgom thabs gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: rnal byor spyod ba lugs nges ba don la ji bzhin sgom thabs gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad ba rdzogs so
